text: Emmerich am Rhein (Low Rhenish: Emmerik) is a town in the Kleve Rural District, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. It had about 31,000 people in 2021. Emmerich lies on the north bank of the Rhine river and borders the province of Gelderland in the Netherlands. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Kleve (district)
title: Emmerich am Rhein
